2 #include<opencv2/opencv.hpp>
3 #include<cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
4 #include<image_transport/image_transport.h>
5 #include<sstream>

7 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
8 {
9  try
10  {
11  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
12  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg,"");
13 
14  ROS_INFO("resolution: %dx%d\n",cv_ptr->image.cols,cv_ptr->image.rows);
15  cv::imshow("view",cv_ptr->image); //eventually window title based in topic
16  cv::waitKey(30);
17  }
18  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
19  {
20  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n",e.what());
21  }
22  return;
23 }
24 
25 int main(int argc, char** argv)
26 {
27  ros::init(argc, argv,"image_viewer");
28  ros::NodeHandle nh;
29  cv::namedWindow("view",cv::WINDOW_AUTOSIZE/* | cv::WINDOW_KEEPRATIO | cv::WINDOW_GUI_EXPANDED*/);
30 
31  if(argc < 2)
32  {
33  ROS_INFO("usage: process <subscriber_topic const char*>\n");
34  return 1;
35  }
36 
37  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
38  image_transport::Subscriber sub = it.subscribe(argv[1],5,imageCallback);
39 
40  ros::spin();
41  cv::destroyWindow("view");
42 
43  return 0;
44 }
